Generally non-specific:

* Local inflammation
	* Generally sinusitis as sinus infection common
* Progression to more extensive local invasion with:
	* Cellulitis
		* Black eschar over skin
	* Pneumonia
	* Cerebral invasion
		* Cranial nerve signs
